text: @gtconway3d It would be terrific if trump would  "shelter in place" in Florida and stay off of all broadcasts for the duration of his term. Better yet, put him and his family in a bunker and tell them he'll get COVID-19 if he comes out.   They could stay there until say. . . 01/20/21?
